snippet: The justice system was at issue in the proceedings against Richard J. Combs, who was indicted last month for the 2011 shooting death of Bernard Bailey, an unarmed black man.
abstract: Rural murder trial of former Eutawville, SC, police chief Richard J Combs for 2011 shooting death of unarmed black man Bernard Bailey is playing out during national turmoil over police conduct and race relations; trial has become forum for several issues, including potential pitfalls of policing in rural areas and when officers should employ restraint.
lead_paragraph: The justice system was at issue in the proceedings against Richard J. Combs, who was indicted last month for the 2011 shooting death of Bernard Bailey, an unarmed black man.

headline.main: Rural Justice Focus of Ex-Police Chief’s Murder Trial
headline.print_headline: Rural Justice Focus of Ex-Police Chief’s Murder Trial
